main event: A round, reddish orange object the size of a basketball was observed falling and exploding, leaving a white smoke trail.
interesting points: The object appeared somewhat like a falling star before it exploded., The explosion resulted in a reddish orange glare that illuminated the surrounding area., The sighting lasted for about five minutes., The observation was made with the naked eye on a clear night., The report indicates that what was seen was likely a meteor or fireball.
witness description: 34-year-old factory service attendant from Soap Lake, Washington.
